product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Kettle Chili - Single Serving
long_description: Settle back at the campfire and enjoy a hot bowl of delicious MaryJanesFarm Organic Kettle Chili. Chili is gluten-free and made with all-natural, organic ingredients. To prepare in its own pouch, just add boiling water, stir and let stand before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents.
short_description: Settle back at the campfire and enjoy a hot bowl of delicious MaryJanesFarm Organic Kettle Chili.
